TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormShowConstants extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供常量以与 Visual Basic 6.0 方法保持兼容。

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，`Modal`参数`Show`方法用于确定窗体是否将显示为模式对话框。In Visual Basic 6.0, the `Modal` parameter of the `Show` method was used to determine whether a form would be shown as a modal dialog box. 在 Visual Basic 中，`Modal`参数替换为两个不同的显示方法：和。In Visual Basic, the `Modal` parameter is replaced by two different Show methods: and . 这些常数启用已从 Visual Basic 6.0 中继续运行而不进行其他修改升级的代码。These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > 函数和对象在命名空间提供用于连接通过从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic 的工具。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FormShowConstants Modal = int32(1)

summary.span: 等效于 Visual Basic 6.0 常量 。

span.span: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FormShowConstants Modeless = int32(0)
